name: T e c h T u r b o
name_original: T e c h T u r b o
description:
Enjoy an endless drive through endless musical variations.

Using leftover parts from my other neon game Interesting Decisions, I put together a little vaporwave- and aesthetic-inspired, infinite driving simulator.

Instructions:

Keep driving! Get cash!

Arrow keys or WASD maneuver, mouse steers, space jumps (if you're into that kind of thing).

Get the music on Bandcamp:
